child.title: 芝士星语 Queen Cheese
child.des: 轻芝士带来绵密润滑，重芝士带来浓郁厚实，两种烘焙制作手法，享受女王尊贵。The smooth of light cheese marries the rich of heavy cheese, honor you as the Queen。

child.title: 芒果拿破仑 Fresh Mango Napoleon
child.des: 芒果酸甜多汁和酥皮酥脆清香，是芒果拿破仑让人沉沦的独特口感。Mango sweet and juicy and crisp crisp fragrance, unique taste of mango Napoleon let people down.

child.title: 超级蜂巢 Super hive cake
child.des: 芒果的酸甜“侵略”了蛋糕的每一寸，果浆比果酱更有热带水果的醇香。Sweet and sour mango aggression cake every inch, pulp than more tropical fruit mellow sauce

child.title: 奶香巧克力 chocolate cake
child.des: 在进口的第一刹那就沉沦，只留下奶香巧克力化也化不开的醇香。Sinking in the first moment of imports, leaving only the milk chocolate also is not mellow.

child.title: 浓情巧克力 Chocolate in Love
child.des: 浓滑如丝柔，将巧克力的浓郁加倍，却如空气般轻盈。Thick as silk soft, the strong double chocolate, but as light as air.
